entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Drayton Valley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
